item.title: BIM 3D Revit Engineer for team support - Upwork
item.description:
Position Overview:
As a Revit Drafter, you will play a pivotal role in our design team, providing essential drafting and modeling support for our various projects and teams. Your expertise in Revit will be instrumental in transforming conceptual designs into detailed models and drawings, ensuring precision and efficiency in our delivery.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop detailed architectural and engineering drawings using Revit.
Collaborate with project teams to understand and execute design requirements.
Ensure all models and drawings meet industry and company standards.
Assist in the development of BIM strategies and implementation.
Manage and maintain project documentation and drawing files.
Provide technical support and guidance to junior drafting staff.

Qualifications:

Proficient in Revit with at least 2 years of professional experience.
Strong understanding of drafting techniques and building codes.
Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
Ability to work on multiple projects in a fast-paced environment.
Detail-oriented with a commitment to quality and accuracy.


Hourly Range: $20.00-$25.00
Posted On: November 29, 2023 18:33 UTC
Category: Building Information Modeling
Skills:Building Information Modeling, Autodesk Revit, 3D Modeling, AutoCAD Civil 3D, Autodesk AutoCAD, 3D Design
Skills: Building Information Modeling, Autodesk Revit, 3D Modeling, AutoCAD Civil 3D, Autodesk AutoCAD, 3D Design
Country: Kenya

item.title: Inbound SDR for Video Agency (MENA Region) - Upwork
item.description:
Summary рџ’Є
We are a 100% remote and international digital agency. For the last seven years, we've been successfully operating in the web design, development and branding world.

However, in the last six months, we've open a subsidiary and expanded into short-form CGI/mixed reality videos - specifically in the MENA, Europe and North America regions.

We're now looking to expand our sales team with a sharp, friendly, and proactive inbound SDR/sales consultant to take discovery calls and sell our services to leads.

Job Responsibilities рџ¤ќ
All our leads are inbound inquiries/hot leads from Instagram and email. You will be required to speak with leads - that are excited to work with us - and be their personal guide. This will entail gathering information via discovery emails/calls, asking intelligent and dynamic questions (list available), determining costs/timelines with the Efir team via Slack, and then creating a proposal from a template for the lead to review. If all goes well, the client comes on board and you hand them over to one of our Project Manager's to start the project.

Our leads are predominantly from GCC countries (mainly UAE and KSA). We also have occasional leads from Europe and USA (East and West Coast).

99% of the work will be online/laptop based, but if there are leads that would like to meet in person (eg. in Dubai), we'd love to know if you'd be up for that.

You'll need to have вњ…
- Great organization and time management (you'll be working on up to 10 leads at once, but we'll start off with just a few to warm up)
- Excellent and clear communication (written and spoken) in English (Arabic and Russian is a BIG plus!)
- Even better listening skills (understanding client needs/problems and asking thoughtful questions)
- Ability to learn and follow internal processes
- Provide clear progress updates and reports to Head of Sales
- A good sense of humor and working attitude (we're here to do good work but life is about having fun too!)

It'll be great if you also have рџ”Ґ
- Experience in web design/development/branding/video/animation processes
- An eye for design and good presentation
- Proactive suggestions to improve the current sales cycle

Tools You'll Be Using рџ’»
- Gmail
- Pipedrive (CRM)
- WhatsApp Business (For some lead conversations)
- Slack (For internal comms)
- Zoom (Calls)
- Google Sheets (Note-taking)
- Pitch (Proposals)

Additional clauses рџ’µ
We're open to working with you on an hourly base rate + commission or a higher commission-only basis.

About Us рџЊђ
Efir Media (efirmedia.com) (Philadelphia, USA).
We design and build websites for SMBs and larger enterprise clients, based mainly in North America and Europe. We are a team of 17, with a core team consisting of two co-founders, Art Director, Head of Marketing, Head of Sales, Head of Operations, Project Managers and a number of UX/UI Designers, Web Developers, QA Testers and Illustrators. We've won more than 35 industry awards from Awwwards, Behance and Dribbble, and are striving to be one of the best agencies in the world within the next five years.

EfirVFX - Our new video subsidiary
Efir VFX helps brands create exciting, hyperrealistic and fully custom CGI/3D short videos that go viral with millions of views. As a specialised subsidiary of award-winning web design and development agency Efir Media, our skilled CGI artists, live action camera operators and 3D modellers work diligently to produce impressive videos that stops scrolls and opens jaws.

NOTE: To ensure we know that you've read the entire job posting, please include the phrase "El Camino De Mi Alma" somewhere in your application message. Applications without this phrase will not be considered.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$40.00
Posted On: November 29, 2023 18:28 UTC
Category: Sales & Business Development
Skills:Inbound Inquiry, Tech & IT, Pipedrive, Price & Quote Negotiation, Media & Entertainment, Sales Management, Sales, Email Communication, Relationship Management, Customer Discovery, Data Entry, Video Advertising, Video Ad
Skills: Inbound Inquiry, Tech & IT, Pipedrive, Price & Quote Negotiation, Media & Entertainment, Sales Management, Sales, Email Communication, Relationship Management, Customer Discovery, Data Entry, Video Advertising, Video Ad
Country: United States

item.title: Site Measurement in Senior Living Community, Bend, OR - Upwork
item.description:
Hi Shaun,

My name is Sierra Laflamme and I am a Project Manager with Lux Manufacturing Group in Vancouver, Canada. We design and install interiors for senior living communities across the United States.

We are looking for someone to visit a few sites (it will be four in total over the next few months) in the Bend, OR area to make some simple CAD drawings with accompanying photos for us. Our requirements vary from site to site but if you are interested I could send you the details for our first two jobs.  These are existing senior living communities that we are renovating and where we are missing certain pieces of information. For example, our first site we have decent overall floor plans but need elevations for a few walls and columns in six rooms to help us install new millwork. Details needed would include location of electrical and water connection points and existing millwork that we will be replacing, as well as mouldings, window frames, or pilasters that we would need to work around. The second project we don't even have decent floor plans and would need overall floor plans as well, but in a much smaller space.

The timeline would kind of be a as soon as we can kind of thing.

Please reach out if you think this is a job you would be interested in doing for us! I have drawings I can share with you that show in detail the scope of work involved.

Thanks for your time!

Sierra Laflamme
Project Design Manager
Lux Manufacturing Group


Posted On: November 29, 2023 18:26 UTC
Category: CAD
Skills:SketchUp, Drafting, 2D Drafting, Plan Elements Details, 3D Modeling, Architectural Rendering, Autodesk AutoCAD, Architectural Design, CAD Drafting, 3D Rendering, 3D Design, Detailed Design

Country: Canada

item.title: 3D human character model rigging for VR - Upwork
item.description:
We are currently seeking a 3D Rigger to work on a medium poly count 3D human model, intended as a virtual avatar used for online mocap streaming and 3D animation rendering. The successful candidate will be responsible for fully rigging the body and face of the model with controllers to ensure smooth and realistic motion capture and can also be animated manually.

Key Requirements:

1. Model Format: The model will be provided in either .c4d or .blend file format.
2. Rigging: Complete rigging of the human model, focusing on both body and facial features, to enable accurate motion capture.
3. Clothing Integration: The model comes with clothing that includes a sweater, a pair of short pants, and shoes. These need to be effectively attached to the body, while ensuring they remain interchangeable for flexibility in usage.
4. Deadline will be on 30th/March/2024

We are looking for someone who has a portfolio or can showcase your similar previous work.

Budget: $50
Posted On: November 29, 2023 18:23 UTC
Category: AR/VR Design
Skills:Character Animation, VR Application, Unity, Unreal Engine, Autodesk Maya, 3D Rigging, Blender, Maxon Cinema 4D
Skills: Character Animation, VR Application, Unity, Unreal Engine, Autodesk Maya, 3D Rigging, Blender, Maxon Cinema 4D

item.title: 2d/3d Application software development needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are interested in creating a platform that would allow the user to build and design shadow boards online in - similar to the many room or house design platforms.

The closest thing that I’ve seen to make a comparison is planner5d.com (please note that we require a much simpler platform). Please see attached screenshots. We want it simple and easy for the user to navigate and design with drag and drop functionality.

All tools, hooks, and holders, etc. would be available via the side panel. In addition, templates would be accessible for the user to simplify the process.

Core Functionality of Custom Shadow Board Creator Tool:
1.Overall Board Background Design Color (Solid colors / specific brand colors / ASP Design Team Create)
2.Tool Shadow Type (Outline Shadows / Solid Shadows of tools)
3.Tool Shadow Colors
4.Client Logo Location (Top left / top right / center of board)
5.What type of hooks/holders required (Stainless steel push thru hook system / Standard plastic screw mounted hook system / Stainless steel screw mounted hook system)
6.Board Style (Wall Mount / Mobile / Stationary Stand / Magnet Mounted)
7.Board Material (StorShield / StorLam / StorClear / StorShield+ / StorLaze)
8.Board Title & Subtitle (*optional fields)
9.Board Size selector (width x height)
10.Quantity of Board(s)
11.Select Tools from tool bank
12.Request a custom tool

The program would be accessible via any medium and would also be incorporated into our website as well (website will soon be under construction and will be built on Wordpress)

Please submit proposals that include cost, timeline, and availability.

Thank you.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$40.00
Posted On: November 29, 2023 18:12 UTC
Category: Emerging Tech
Skills:Desktop Application, Graphic Design, JavaScript
Skills: Desktop Application, Graphic Design, JavaScript
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Solidworks Furniture Engineer - Upwork
item.description:
Project Description:
We are seeking an experienced draftsperson with 3 to 5 years of expertise in furniture design, specifically proficient in Solidworks. The ideal candidate should possess a keen eye for detail and a strong background in creating furniture with organic shapes. They should have a track record of translating design concepts into technical drawings and bringing them to fruition.  We have around 25-30 artist sketches for a major project that we need converted with detailed specs, to be completed within 1-2 weeks.

Requirements:

*3 to 5 years of experience as a draftsman or engineer in the furniture design domain, showcasing proficiency in Solidworks.
*A robust portfolio showcasing previous projects in furniture design, particularly emphasizing expertise in creating organic shapes.
*Ability to interpret technical drawings and translate conceptual designs into detailed, production-ready plans.
*Strong communication skills for effective collaboration across diverse teams and the realization of design concepts.

If you are a draftsman adept at using Solidworks to create furniture designs featuring organic shapes, we are excited to welcome you aboard! Share your portfolio and experiences in furniture design, and let's embark on this exciting journey together!

item.title: Experienced 3D Artist for Character Creation and Animation - ALMA App Interface Development - Upwork
item.description:
What we are

We are ALMA, an innovative platform dedicated to mental and emotional well-being in workplace settings. Our ALMA App provides specialized tools and resources to enhance the emotional health of employees in large and multinational companies. We focus on creating a healthier and more productive work environment by monitoring stress, managing anxiety, and fostering well-being practices. We're seeking an experienced 3D Artist to bring life to our charming fairy-style character and design a user interface that complements our vision of promoting mental health in the workplace.

Responsibilities:

Design and create a high-quality fairy-style character for the ALMA App, captivating and in line with the application's visual aesthetic.
Develop smooth and expressive animations for the character, bringing life and energy to user interaction.
Design and develop the 3D user interface, maintaining aesthetic coherence and functionality.

Requirements:

Demonstrable experience in 3D character creation for video games or interactive applications.
Proficiency in 3D modeling and animation software like Maya, Blender, ZBrush, etc.
Ability to work within tight deadlines without compromising work quality.
Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate with multidisciplinary teams.

Attachments
In the attachment we put a reference that we have developed in Midjourney, however it is too realistic, the idea is something more stylized, simpler with a corporate focus. But I think it can undoubtedly work as an initial idea, even the character does not necessarily need a mouth and in this way we reduce expressions to communicate. The character does occupy some iddle animations, of movements referring to a response to what the user does in the app. We will provide you with the information on the screens of the entire app in figma, the idea is that the character and its design are consistent with the design of the interface. of the app.


Budget: $2,000

item.title: Seeking long-term partner for Web-Based 3D modeling, animating and rendering project - Upwork
item.description:
We are a digital branding agency based in Brussels, specializing in web development. We are currently seeking a long-term partner for 3D modeling and rendering. Our work incorporates WebGL technologies, as well as pre-rendering solutions for scrolling pages.

This initial assignment aims to assess the contractor's skills in a real-world environment. It involves an existing client but is a pilot project that will not be published.

We have already designed the webpage and outlined the scenario. It's a product landing page, with each section highlighting a benefit of the product. The product is an industrial air filter, unique for its ability to be changed without altering its structure, making it less bulky and more eco-friendly. For a detailed explanation of the product, please refer to this video  https://www.deltrian.com/lfc (link to understand the product).

You can see an example of the technique and technology we use here:
https://fasterdisplays.com/fr/exhibitor

The idea is to create an animation (video) triggered by scrolling at a specific timestamp. Here is the background video: https://fasterdisplays.com/videos/exhibitor/desktop/expositor3.mp4 (Example of expected finish)

Another example: https://www.hyperframe.com/.

**Attention**
It is important that the product appears as realistic as possible, with precise physics, texture, and motion. The elements are organic, comprising filter media and plastic (hence imperfections and variations).

**Scenario**
The site will feature 5 sections/keyframes (benefits):
1. Pocket Filter (Packshot)
2. Slight pullback of the product
3. Frame removal (animation of elasticity gripping and releasing the frame)
4. Folding of the filter (highlighting its volume)
5. Insertion into a vacuum bag (animation of the bag retracting)

**Deliverables**
A video of approximately 30 seconds at 120 or 60 fps. The timing should be adjusted according to the keyframes of the page.

**Page Design + Scenario**
(see attached)

Budget: $1,500
Posted On: November 29, 2023 16:50 UTC
Category: 3D Modeling & Rendering
Skills:Photorealistic Rendering, 3D Modeling, Industrial Design, WebGL
Skills: Photorealistic Rendering, 3D Modeling, Industrial Design, WebGL
Country: Belgium

item.title: Jewelry 3D Modeling Expert Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced 3D modeling freelancer to transform a photo of a unique piece of jewelry into a production-ready 3D model. This project involves creating a detailed and accurate representation of the jewelry for mass production purposes.

Responsibilities:

Analyze provided photos and sketches to understand the design details.
Create a high-quality 3D model of the jewelry with precision and attention to detail.
Ensure that the model is suitable for mass production, considering materials and manufacturing processes.
Provide regular updates on the progress of the 3D model and incorporate feedback as needed.
Deliver the final 3D model files in a format compatible with industry-standard software.

Requirements:

* Proven experience in 3D modeling for jewelry, with a strong portfolio showcasing past projects.
* Proficiency in relevant software such as Rhino, Blender, or similar.
* Understanding of jewelry design principles, materials, and production processes.
* Strong communication skills and the ability to incorporate client feedback effectively.
* Ability to meet deadlines and deliver high-quality work.

We look forward to reviewing your proposals and finding the right freelancer to bring our jewelry design to life!

Hourly Range: $3.00-$20.00
Posted On: November 29, 2023 16:21 UTC
Category: 3D Modeling & Rendering
Skills:Art & Design, 3D Modeling, 3D Design, Jewelry Design, 3D Rendering
Skills: Art & Design, 3D Modeling, 3D Design, Jewelry Design, 3D Rendering
